Name: The Poolbar
Review Text:
Great place to hang out with friends and play bar games or board games. The staff is super friendly and the overall atmosphere is fun.
Its a little expensive but worth a visit. The only bad thing is how loud the music is.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Nice atmosphere, reasonably priced drinks. Staff need to work on their customer tracking/queue system. We waited over 2hrs for a table (admittedly on a busy Saturday evening, so that's understandable) but we got passed over repeatedly for a ‚Ä¶

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: This place was pretty cool. Good drinks and a lot of games (although most were obviously in Dutch). The bathroom was a lot nicer and cleaner than I expected (bar bathrooms are gross). There was a bit of a wait to actually play pool, but all things considered we had a great time!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Went there, the barman was amazing. He recommended me all the beers I had (Like 8) also had some shots with him and even took a picture. There are lots of games to play and the place is very cozy

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Beautiful and cosy bar. (Gezellig, if my dutch is any good). Friendly and helpful staff. Great night!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text:
Super chill!
Friendly, fun staff & good prices ü§©

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Of you want a cold Heineken beer this is a good place. Grab some fries next door at  VleminckX and go there for a beer. If you cant cope up with people smoking make sure to go inside.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: One of the best bars to play pool during your stay in Amsterdam, really kind staff and the crowd is perfect for making new friends. Also, the beer tastes awesome.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great place, great staff. Highly recommend for a night out with friends or your date

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: I love this place. Gets a bit busy but friendly atmosphere and super nice servers. Clean place, really love it, will come back again every chance I get haha. Cheers ‚ù§

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great little spot for a few games of pool and a few drinks the staff are lovely ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: We went there for our friend's stag do. A great place, excellent ambient and perfect service. The waiter is a very nice guy, thanks very much!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Excellent place to have a drink a play pool , nice staff

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: This is a really nice place to have some beer and play a game or two of pool.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great range of drinks and games to play! Had a great laugh here with a group of 8 of us, so much so we decided to visit the next day! The barman was spot on as well! Friendly and helpful! Thanks

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Amazing bar in the heart of Amsterdam. Nice service and environment. There's a lot of table games to play and have fun! You can rent the pools per hours and enjoy with friends. Very friendly service!!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: nice pool hall with fair prices for drinks, many pool tables but expect a wait in the evenings near the weekend, I recommend booking.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Tons of games other than pool available at this place. The bartenders are very nice and you can also sit outside.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: I love this place! Great pub to hangout with your friends

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Love this place!!! And all  staff crew are super friendly

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Friendly bar staff and fun place to hang out with friends for a few hours.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great range of drinks and games to play! Had a great laugh here with a group of 8 of us, so much so we decided to visit the next day! The barman was spot on as well! Friendly and helpful! Thanks

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Amazing bar in the heart of Amsterdam. Nice service and environment. There's a lot of table games to play and have fun! You can rent the pools per hours and enjoy with friends. Very friendly service!!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great atmosphere with a great staff. The neighbors upstairs were pretty cool too.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: nice pool hall with fair prices for drinks, many pool tables but expect a wait in the evenings near the weekend, I recommend booking.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Get staff, great music. They play requests! Plus, good beers!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Nice place, more of a pub style rather than a pro pool place but most of us aren‚Äôt pros either.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Nice place to drink and play with friends.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: I went to The Poolbar only once and i had such a great time that I already had decided i would celebrate my birthday there. I emailed them asking about it and got a very fast response. Rob was very nice and called me to give me more details ‚Ä¶

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: I love the pool bar

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great place to play some pool and hangout. Staff were really nice and it was a great atmosphere. ‚Ç¨13 an hour for a pool table seemed a bit steep but other than that I'd highly recommend it.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: The pool bar is a good place where you can spend a great quality time with your friends and enjoy a nice drink while you are playing pool in a welcoming atmosphere. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text:
Friendly staff and cheap renting prices for the pool tables. Choice from medium size and (some) large size tables.
The space around the medium tables can sometimes be a little narrow, but nothing ‚Ä¶

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great place to get some cold beers and play pool. Best thing is the rock old school music if you are a fan of that. Outside space on a small and  cute street in the heart of Amsterdam! Smoking only outside of you need to know! Cool place so far!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Lovely bar, and they have a lot of pool tables downstairs. You can smoke while playing pool (inside the premises). This might be quite attractive for some pool enthusiasts. For others, it's a shame, as you will leave stinking of cigarette ‚Ä¶

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text:
If you're looking for a place to have a drink and play some pool, look no further.
This place is huge and there are lots of quality tables to play at. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Big-sized bar with a decent amount of pool tables. Prices aren't bad for it to be located on the city centre. Music's pretty good and staff's very friendly, my partner and I were hosted by this kind Dutch barman who made our night a lot better. Finally found a proper pool bar in Amsterdam. Definitely coming back.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text:
It was an amazing experience.

Wasnt too busy when we arrived, the barman suggested drinks for us and gave us some good tips before we played a couple of games of pool. Will definitely be going back again

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Get staff, great music. They play requests! Plus, good beers!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Lots of people and lots of fun, even two regulation tables. Very cramped as expected for this city, and some shots cannot be made even without people in the way so come for fun or practice...and a nice staff serving cold beers.  And the kitties, of course!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great service, genuinely friendly staff. Not expensive. Great atmosphere and a nice amount of pool tables in good condition. Don't worry, there are regular bar seats, tables and a cozy corner as well, away from the pool tables. A definite recommendation.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Had a good night here playing a solo game of pool and watching the England v Russia football match. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text:
It was a small but nice little bar, we visited whilst on holiday for the weekend and we're looking for somewhere to watch the Manu Vs ManC Derby.
The beer was reasonably priced and we enjoyed the music  played. However it being a sports bar I expected bigger TVs and better seating around them.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Had a lot of fun here. Ended up going two nights in a row. Relaxed atmosphere with well priced drinks, friendly bar staff

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Nice pool bar, also has a bunch of board games to play if you're not coming to play pool. Music is a bit loud though, which makes conversation a bit difficult.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: If you fancy some pool and a beer this is the place to be. I was impressed with the amount of tables each well lit with ample space. What more can a lad want? If I were to change 1 thing it would be the lack of decent cues however that's minor as its a bit of fun.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: It might look a little dubious or run down from the ourside, but it is very much just the character for The Pool Bar! They have plenty of tables available and charge by the minute, but the prices are extremely reasonable, and they have more ‚Ä¶

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text:
One of the most easy going places I know!
Very friendly staff, lots of pool tables and other games if you need to wait.
Enough space if you want to have beers in a small group.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Cool casual pub with a wide selection of pub and board games aside from the pool. The vibe is sort of friendly in that 'sitcom bar after work hangout' kind of way? Prepare for a long wait for pool on weekends

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: The Poolbar is a place where you can go on any day at you will always have a good time. It is a great place to start your evening in Amsterdam with friends and you will definitely enjoy yourself here. The staff is friendly and they have plenty of things to do.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Good place for a game of pool, no doubt. However, I'm giving a low rating as they served the worst coffee, by far, of any place I've ever been to in any country. Truly disgusting. It makes me wonder why it was so bad...

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: It's a fun dive bar. Cheap beer, pool tables (expect a really long wait during the weekend), board games, etc. Friendly staff who take care of the pool queue. You will smell like cigarettes by the time you leave though.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great music and close to center.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Both pool and board games such as Backgammon are available. Great tournaments, friendly people (both staff and guests). Reasonable prices for drinks, especially a pitcher of beer and Jagermeister shots. The only con is that it's allowed to smoke inside.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: The place is basically split into two parts. In the bar area you'll find plenty of (free) board games, a TV is usually showing sports, great music and a staff that always delivers a nice atmosphere. I always feel like home a bit. Except for ‚Ä¶

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Its a pool bar. Great ambience in the evenings with board games and pool tables. Shuttle boards available with a dart board. Snack bites available. Pool tournament every first Sunday of the month and pub quiz every first Monday of the month. Staff friendly. 8/10 All round.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text:
Slightly loud , but a cool bar.
Folks are mostly under 20 tho, at least when I was there üòÖ felt kinda odd, but its not the bars fault

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Really nice place but very crowded. If you come to play pool,  most likely you will not get your turn.  On the other hand there are, some board games and and a separated area for smoking (even weed).

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Nice bar with Pooltables in the smoking area. Prices are okay and there is lots of room. I was a bit disapointed when the staff didn't want to plug in my phone, and pointed to a paid charging station. Said charging station did not have the ability to chage over USB-C, leaving me with a dead battery.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great atmosphere with a great staff. The neighbors upstairs were pretty cool too.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text:
Cool little location for playing some pool. Unfortunately where the tables are is a cigarette smoker room.
However, smoke free area with boardgames in a nicely decorated room in the front, and chill atmosphere.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Looking for the best way to spend a few relaxed hours during a rainy day, or the better part of an evening? This is one of the best options in Amsterdam. The staff is friendly, the menu is good and the tables have a lot of action. Also the Dampkring isn‚Äôt too far away, besides being in Spui.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Nipped in here on a rainy afternoon. Friendly staff & atmosphere, plenty of pool tables & good beer. Great for a friendly knock around on the tables. Was busy on our mid afternoon visit, popular place.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text:
Great place to relax and play pool.
The barman was super friendly. Defo looking forward to revisiting next time we're in Dam.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Good atmosphere. It can get quite busy, so there might be a waiting line for playing pool. But there are board games to keep you busy if you want.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: The place to be to shoot pool, play games and drink beer...

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Bustling pool bar, not necessarily popular only for the pool tables. Bar area is rather small, there are a lot of board games + more. You can smoke in the pool area which makes it a bit annoying for non-smokers.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Awesome place! Prices are great too. Gets busy in the evening so try and get in early if you wanna play pool.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Really nice place. More rock, punk music. Very big pool area where you're allowed to smoke. Good start to have drinks before clubbing

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Very good music, constantly! Friendly staff ‚Äî while I was writing this review the bartender invited us two ‚Äúapple pie ‚Äú shots which were amazingly good!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Reasonable place to play some pool and have a few drinks plus smoke cigarettes which is novel! Tables were a bit worn but otherwise it's a decent enough place.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text:
Nice place with enough tables and amazing crowd. Not sure if they can avoid smoking inside somehow.
Bar is really good as well

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Nice  bar, friendly staff although pool tables arent great but we enjoyed our night

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text:
Great place to play games in general (and pool)!
You can also smoke inside the pool area and in a small windowed room within the bar, which is neat.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Very nice place to hang out... order a bucket of beer and play some pool.  The bartender who is also the owner I guess, is very friendly and nice to talk with.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Just awesome...the staff and the customers are pleasent and fun...wish the covid was gone so I could sing and dance with these folks

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Nice place for playing some pool, darts or some boardgames, usually pretty busy though. Generally nice staff

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: They have billiards, 2 sjoelbak tables and some board games. It's a relaxed bar where you can go with friends to drink some beers while having fun.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: It's the perfect place to have fun with friends, I play jenga for the first time here!  And also the staff it's polite and friendlyüòéüíØ

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great to spend an evening with friends. You can play pool (paid per hour) or other games. Beers are served in big jars.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Love this place. You can smoke inside, have cheap shots. Good beer, games and overall nice atmosphere.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Fantastic bar with reasonably priced beer and great pool tables and board games for a calm night with mates.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Nice atmosphere, tables are well used but no surprise, nice to have a few games nothing serious

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Had some great nights out with my colleagues here! I dont work around there anymore but i definitely will visit again.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Nice place for a beer with the homies, it has (as per the name) a lot of pool tables but also a few other games and board games to keep you entertained all night and avoid awkward silence between you and your date.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Nice place to have a game or two of pool. Apart from that they have some nice table games and dart as well

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: First time in there and definitely not a last. Nice place where to play a pool. Highly recommended!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Affordable drinks with plenty of pool tables and a darts board. Excellent spot for mid-week drinks.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Love this place, everytime I come around it feels like coming home. The staff is amazing, always in for fun and games or for a good heart to heart.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Chilled out place with fab prices, friendly staff. I had a few beers n shots. Would go there again...

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great atmosphere, calm and cool location with plenty of tables and fairly priced beer.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Don't go here if you are looking for a full-size level pooltable with enough room to swing a cat, but there's a great atmosphere, nice music and lovely people.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Nice bar, but don't come here for just pool, the equipment is quite cheap.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Nice place to drink and play with friends.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Pretty nice pool place. Good atmosphere, decent price for drinks. Would come back for more.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great atmosphere and the best place to have a beer and play some pool with friends!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Super cool music, super kind staff, good beers and fair prices to spend a good time with friends in town

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Nice dive-in bar, large smoking area. Good fun especially if you like to play pool.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: I like it ! Bar people are great , service is nice but so busy , anyway it deserves a try :) .

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Love this place! I try to come back every time I visit Amsterdam. If you like pool you must visit the Pool Bar!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text:
Good atmosph√®re, 5‚Ç¨ Pint
12‚Ç¨ for an hour at the table, and you can smoke cigarets
I recomend

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Plenty of nice tables and decent bar showing sports. Go there every time I'm in dam

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: A great pool bar, , service is good but best to go early in the evening as waiting times for a table can be long! Make sure to ask

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: This place brings me back every time I‚Äôm in Amsterdam. Friendly, fun and relaxed.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Small pool tables but close to the center and good environment to chill and play a few games. Not American tables tho.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Really nice bar, loads of different games to play and the pool is fun!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great bar with nice people, board games, billiards and 2.90‚Ç¨ beer.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Spent ages in here, good price pitchers. Pool tables have massive pockets

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Amazing atmosphere, (they have pools for days) i go there on the weekends to play pool with my friends.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: American pool tables in great condition and although I prefer British pool it was fun especially when you are üòâ

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: The atmosphere there makes you feel like you know all the people your whole life, they also have the Jenga drinking game

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Cool place. The staff was nice. Good music and pool tables !

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Table didn't function 100% correctly and looked worn down. But it worked and was fun.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: This bar is very busy bar but good for beer affordable price for drinks and sports activities

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: great place to play pool with friends.. also has a good bar.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: I really like this place. I go there every time when I am in Amsterdam. The music's good and the beer is cheap.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Love the place! Quality pool experience + amazing atmosphere.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Liked the atmosphere and the bartender had money collection at which a friend of my from Bucharest added the currency "leu" to his collection :)

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Good service, played pool and darts and watched the footy. Nice and  friendly

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: We go here with our colleagues some times. It's okay, everything you expect from a poolbar, and friendly service!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Place with extra ordinary looking (black ceiling with pool balls glued üòÇ) good climate. Could be more clean.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Perfect place to chill out, play pool and have a few drinks!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Lots of pool tables and good tab service, with the ambience of a regular Amsterdam pub

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Loved this place. Played darts. Great staff.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great place to have a nice game of pool with good taste in music and pleasant atmosphere

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: One of my fav in Amsterdam, games and cold beer. Also nice food and beautiful people

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: The poolbar is a great place to play games and drink I have been there a lot I love it

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Cool friendly staff and grungey relaxed vibe. Only drawback was not being able to pay with international cards.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Nice place. Many pooltables and even darts and shuffleboard. A bit expensive though.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Really good that you can play pool and board games whilst drinking but very expensive

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Not too busy, nice staff, good price for quality

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great atmosphere. Decent pool area and boardgames bar the bar.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great place, nice staff and good music. Gets really busy.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Cool place. Tables are ok. Lots of board games too

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Super chill place and nice pool tables!

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great for pool, not so much for keeping distance

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Always fun for a few drinks and games of pool. I visit every time I'm in Amsterdam.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Great environment with kind staff! Would definitely recommend to friend ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: A bit pricey for pool, but otherwise a nice place.

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Nice amount of things to do, great music, friendly staff

Name: The Poolbar
Review Text: Good atmosphere, excellent music and the staff is funny, competent and friendly.

Name: The Poolbar
